meanings.definition: To cut apart or separate into pieces
meanings.sent1: The scientist dissected the frog in biology class.
meanings.sent2: She carefully dissected the flower to study its parts.
meanings.sent3: The chef dissected the cake into tiny slices for the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The detective dissected the evidence to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon skillfully dissected the tumor during the operation.

meanings.sent1: The dissected puzzle pieces were scattered on the table.
meanings.sent2: The dissected map revealed hidden details of the terrain.
meanings.sent3: The dissected book chapters made it easier to study for the exam.
meanings.sent4: The dissected orange segments were perfect for snacking.
meanings.sent5: The dissected worm wriggled in separate parts after the experiment.
